mapper.insert: insert into orders (ordersId, orderstype, handoverId, goodsname, goodswieght, mailer, mailaddress, readdress, orderstatus, mailphone, consignee, consigneephone, startcity, middlecity, finalcity, yunsongprice, disprice, yunshuprice, finalprice, car, remarks ) values (#{ordersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodswieght,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consigneephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middlecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yunsongprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yunshuprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{car,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update orders set orderstype = #{orderstype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, handoverId = #{handoverid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodswieght = #{goodswieght,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mailer = #{mailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mailaddress = #{mailaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, readdress = #{readdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderstatus = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mailphone = #{mailphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consigneephone = #{consigneephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startcity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, middlecity = #{middlecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finalcity = #{finalcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yunsongprice = #{yunsongprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, disprice = #{disprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yunshuprice = #{yunshuprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, finalprice = #{finalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car = #{car,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ordersId = #{ordersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ordersId, orderstype, handoverId, goodsname, goodswieght, mailer, mailaddress, readdress, orderstatus, mailphone, consignee, consigneephone, startcity, middlecity, finalcity, yunsongprice, disprice, yunshuprice, finalprice, car, remarks from orders where ordersId = #{ordersid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ordersId, orderstype, handoverId, goodsname, goodswieght, mailer, mailaddress, readdress, orderstatus, mailphone, consignee, consigneephone, startcity, middlecity, finalcity, yunsongprice, disprice, yunshuprice, finalprice, car, remarks from orders
